rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C112450

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version Test Name Terminology

definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version test name.
name: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version Test Name Terminology
synonyms: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Get Afraid When Cannot Catch My Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
synonyms: SGRQ02-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - My Cough is Embarrassing in Public

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing hurts.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Coughing Hurts

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing makes me tired.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Coughing Makes Me Tired

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Describe Your Current Health

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - How would you describe your respiratory condition?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Describe Your Respiratory Condition

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as very heavy manual work, ride a bike, run, swim fast, or play competitive sports.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Do Heavy Manual Work
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work
synonyms: SGRQ02-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Walk Up Hills

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: I get embarrassed using my medication in public.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Embarrassed Using Medication in Public

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Everything seems too much of an effort.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Everything Too Much Effort

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Exercise is not safe for me.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
synonyms: SGRQ02-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - How long did the worst respiratory attack last?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - How Long Did Worst Respiratory Attack Last
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last
synonyms: SGRQ02-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Over the past 4 weeks, in a typical week, how many good days (with few respiratory problems) have you had?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - How Many Good Days You Had
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-How Many Good Days Have You Had
synonyms: SGRQ02-How Many Good Days Have You Had

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Best describe how your respiratory problems affect you.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - How Respiratory Problems Affect You

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Do Household Chores

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Move Far From Bed or Chair
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed
synonyms: SGRQ02-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot play sports or do other physical activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Play Sports or Do Physical Activities

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Cannot Take A Bath or Shower
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-I Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
synonyms: SGRQ02-I Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: I get exhausted easily.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - I Get Exhausted Easily

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I have become frail or an invalid because of my respiratory problems.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Become Frail or Invalid Because of My Respiratory Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Over the past 4 weeks, I have brought up phlegm (sputum).
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - I Have Brought Up Phlegm

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Over the past 4 weeks, I have coughed.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - I Have Coughed

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Over the past 4 weeks, I have had shortness of breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - I Have Had Shortness of Breath
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-I Have Had Shortness of Breath
synonyms: SGRQ02-I Have Had Shortness of Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - Over the past 4 weeks, I have had wheezing attacks.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - I Have Had Wheezing Attacks

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Walk Slower Than Other People My Age
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-I Walk Slower Than Other People
synonyms: SGRQ02-I Walk Slower Than Other People

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I hurry or walk fast, I have to stop or slow down.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - If Walk Fast I Have to Stop or Slow Down
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
synonyms: SGRQ02-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - If you have ever held a job.

terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-If You Have Ever Held a Job
synonyms: SGRQ02-If You Have Ever Held a Job

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: Jobs such as household chores take a long time, or I have to stop to rest.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Jobs Take Long Time or I Have to Stop

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I do not expect my respiratory problems to get any better.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Not Expect Respiratory Problems Get Better
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Not Expect Probs to Get Better
synonyms: SGRQ02-Not Expect Probs to Get Better

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I feel that I am not in control of my respiratory problems.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Not in Control of My Respiratory Problems
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Not in Control of Resp Problems
synonyms: SGRQ02-Not in Control of Resp Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Playing sports or other physical activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Playing Sports or Other Physical Activities

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbors.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: I am short of breath when I bend over.

terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Short of Breath When Bend Over
synonyms: SGRQ02-Short of Breath When Bend Over

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Short of Breath When I Talk
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ02-Short of Breath When I Talk
synonyms: SGRQ02-Short of Breath When I Talk

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Sitting or lying still.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Sitting or Lying Still

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I take a long time to get washed or dressed.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Take Long Time to Get Washed or Dressed

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Times Suffered From Severe Respiratory Attacks

synonyms: SGRQ02-Treatment Does Not Help Me Much

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Treatment Interferes With My Life

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 4 Weeks Version - Unpleasant Side Effects From Medication
